title: Performance Of The Weekend
description:
Pablo Torre, Domonique Foxworth and The Ringer's Kevin Clark debate who had the best performance this weekend: LeBron, Tatum or Jokic before talking how significant it is that Aaron Rodgers has reportedly lined up trades with the Broncos, Steelers and Titans.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: (debatable): What Player Had The Performance Of The Weekend In The NBA?
